name: Action Cameras
desc: For the adventure seekers and adrenaline junkies, action cameras are a no brainer. Action cameras are perfect for the outdoors. They can withstand rough weather conditions, they’re shockproof, lightweight, and highly durable.For the adventure seekers and adrenaline junkies, action cameras are a no brainer. Action cameras are perfect for the outdoors. They can withstand rough weather conditions, they’re shockproof, lightweight, and highly durable.

name: DSLR camera
desc: DSLR stands for “Digital Single Lens Reflex”. If you’re looking to take your photography to a more professional level, consider getting a DSLR camera. They have been the go to camera for many professionals in the digital age.DSLR stands for “Digital Single Lens Reflex”. If you’re looking to take your photography to a more professional level, consider getting a DSLR camera. They have been the go to camera for many professionals in the digital age.

name: Mirrorless cameras
desc: Digital mirrorless cameras, as the name suggests, have no mirror. What you see when you look through the viewfinder is an small electronic screen. This displays what you are pointing your lens at. Digital mirrorless cameras, as the name suggests, have no mirror. What you see when you look through the viewfinder is an small electronic screen. This displays what you are pointing your lens at.

name: Bridge Cameras
desc: A bridge  camera is a type of camera many people choose when they get more serious about photography. You may have discovered you love taking pictures. Is using your phone or compact camera limiting? Bridge cameras are far more capable and without the limitations of smaller cameras.A bridge  camera is a type of camera many people choose when they get more serious about photography. You may have discovered you love taking pictures. Is using your phone or compact camera limiting? Bridge cameras are far more capable and without the limitations of smaller cameras.

name: Compact Cameras
desc: Compact cameras are small and designed to he easy to use. This type of camera is often called a point-and-shoot camera because they are so quick and easy to take photos with. name: Film Cameras
desc: Film is not dead. Many beginner photographers are using film cameras to develop their style and skills. Many experience photographers prefer the look and feel of photos taken with film.Film is not dead. Many beginner photographers are using film cameras to develop their style and skills. Many experience photographers prefer the look and feel of photos taken with film.

name: 360 Cameras

name: Instant Cameras
desc: Compact instant cameras are back and they’re definitely a fun option. name: Medium Format Cameras
desc: Back in the day, photographers used medium format cameras with 120mm films. But nowadays, medium format camera is a different type of camera. It is now replaced with a digital medium format back with a sensor size similar to 120mm film.
